thread.section_title: Saint James Paris - Relais et Chateaux - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing
thread.title_full: Amazing - Review of Saint James Paris - Relais et Chateaux, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Pepper M
title: Amazing
text:
Even though last July has been hard for France, we had a lovely time. The hotel is so chic and comfortable, with a lovely garden and delicious breakfast. The staff is amazing y really kind, we where coming from an appalling experience due to ineptitude at The Shangri-La, and they made us feel confortable and cared. The difference between being a familiar Relais et Chateaux and just a foreign chain.
Highly recommendable. Distinctive in every aspect. We loved it.
